content.p: Global Peace Foundation (GPF) Malaysia Internship Programme Description: Looking for a fun-filled internship with real hands-on job experience? Wish you can contribute to make a difference? You have come to the right place. Global Peace Foundation Malaysia is a chapter of the international Global Peace Foundation based in Washington D.C. We are committed to bring our humanity as one human family transcending race, culture and nationality. GPF works across continents to engage people and organisations in creating positive social impact. We are an easy-going bunch, working together towards greater good and we are looking for TALENTS with HEART in making this world a better place! Download the application form and send them to info@globalpeace.org.my. You can go to Global Peace internship to know what previous interns had to say about working with us! telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
